django.contrib.sessions.base_session
====================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.sessions.base_session

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module allows importing AbstractBaseSession even
   when django.contrib.sessions is not in INSTALLED_APPS.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.sessions.base_session.BaseSessionManager
   django.contrib.sessions.base_session.AbstractBaseSession


Module Contents
---------------

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.db.models.Manager`


   .. py:method:: encode(session_dict)

      Return the given session dictionary serialized and encoded as a string.



   .. py:method:: save(session_key, session_dict, expire_date)

      .. py:attribute:: abstract
         :value: True
